attributes.action: Scrap wards in NHS hospitals & replace them with individual rooms/cubicles to restrict the spread of disease!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In our opinions we feel that cleaning hospitals wont actually do anything to stop disease spreading, we do feel that its all down to wards, open wards where people are spreading disease. The way forward is seperate rooms or cubicles!
